07-JAN-2003 AS SCR 2760; disabled check for Office version if
[FLSETTINGS]CHKOFFICEVRSN=N
This program can be used to "merge" values from a database record on a
Word document. Note: This is not a mail merge. The program does nor
loop on a series of documents nor does it loop over several records.
It tries to lookup text marks on a given document and fills in the
information. Names of textmarks and the value the program should fill
in, are given as name-value pairs via (temp.) table TEMP_WORDMERGE.
initialization of parameters. we do not want to change pi. params
so we add eventually missing trailling backslash to a copy of dirname
for testing purposes
template name and path can be overwritten in the .ini
During testing there's no need to change existing templates then
